name: Immortal Astronaut
description:
Immortal Astronaut

Made for

The Krass-N.G. Jam 16!

Theme: A game where you bomb spaceships to live forever.

Might be unfortunately intensive on browsers, especially in fullscreen.

---

WASD to Move

Shift to Boost

Space to Brake

Click to Fire

Mouse while Holding Click to control Missiles

---
